document.full_text: the more aggressively a bank lobbied before the financial crisis, the worse its loans performed during the economic downturn -- and the more bailout dollars it received, according to a study published by the national bureau of economic research this week.
document.title: top lobbying banks got biggest bailouts: study
lines_and_colors: the more aggressively a bank lobbied before the financial crisis, the worse its loans performed during the economic downturn -- and the more bailout dollars it received, according to a study published by the national bureau of economic research this week.
